entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
